tool_description: Easily bypass cloudflare, access geo restricted websites and scrape pages without hassle with our rotating residential proxies.
name: Proxify URL
title: Proxify URL

api_list.name: /proxify
api_list.description: Proxify GET http request. Multiple requests will be billed if response exceeds 100KB.

optional_parameters.name: geo
optional_parameters.description: Request using specific countries, default random country

optional_parameters.name: json
optional_parameters.description: Return request result as a detailed json object, default false
